attributes.action: Allow pets to have vaccinations during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: These are life saving vaccinations. Many of these vaccinations prevent fatal diseases. Without these vaccinations not only can pets become ill and die they also cannot go outside for walks or to toilet.
attributes.background: Loosen the regulations on vet services during Covid-19 to allow pets to have their life saving vaccinations - particularly kitten and puppy vaccinations as without them they cannot be permitted outside safely.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, Government restrictions have loosened such that certain vaccinations can proceed subject to a risk assessment. Contact your local vet to find out what services they are able to provide.

Find out more: https://www.bva.co.uk/coronavirus/frequently-asked-questions.
